TopicTitle: I think people would really appreciate progression bars in bug reports like we used to have in KSP1!

Articles.Content:
Bugfixing straight-up doesn’t work this way. There’s basically 5 stages.

1. I know there’s a bug

2. I can reproduce the bug

3. I know why the bug happens

4. I have a solution 

5. The solution works

 None of these actually map to amount of time taken, and progress jumps back and forth around 2, 3, and 4 constantly and unpredictably. Thus, having a “progress bar” is not really useful.
